features: The Play sneaker features a pre-distressed, unlaced look with elastic inside to keep these on and take these off easily.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PLAY The Play sneaker features a pre-distressed, unlaced look with elastic inside to keep these on and take these off easily. Everyone will be able to spot that these are Blowfish Malibu with our signature branded eyelets!

BLOOM Insoles Going forward, Blowfish Malibu will utilize BLOOM pellets in all shoes featuring insoles in our Women’s collections. This technology uses algae to create pellets which are then used as a sustainable material in consumer products. BLOOM allows companies like Blowfish Malibu to innovate and create more eco-conscious products with measurable impacts. ABOUT US Blowfish Malibu was born when our founders teamed together to create a shoe brand that embodied the place they loved most: Malibu, California. For every season since, Blowfish Malibu has delighted shoe lovers with comfortable, on-trend styles. The end goal for Blowfish Malibu is simple: make quality, fashionable shoes and sell them at affordable prices. With our styles, we will always strive to capture the fresh, youthful spirit and casual living that is distinctively Southern California. WHAT SETS US APART Skilled, experienced, and forward-thinking designersObsession with comfortOn trend, original designsFresh and creative detailsQuality shoes at affordable prices

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute shoe, even for 83 year old grannies!”
reviews.reviewText: I wear an 8 1/2 - 9 Narrow. I order an 8 1/2 in These shoes. I have 7 or 8 pairs of blowfish .. main reason they fit my narrow foot (Most of the time) The sneaker and bootie types have an elastic band which helps hold the shoe on my foot I still have to use insoles to take up space but once I get adjustments made these are the most comfortable shoes I have. I especially love the ones with thick soles. I may be in my eighties but I’m going to look cute and trendy as long as possible 😂.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Quite a Size 10…
reviews.reviewText: I read the reviews and waffled on buying these. I wear a size 10 in every shoe I own, and my foot is pretty much average width, trending to the narrower side of normal. Thought I’d try them as a replacement for the S. Oliver’s I got in Ireland and can’t find here (BEST. CANVAS. SNEAKER. EVER!!!!). Here are my thoughts:COLORI ordered black. These are, technically, black. Technically. But the color is such a washed out shade that wearing them with black leggings makes the shoe look off—almost worn out given the intentionally frayed fabric edges. They’re okay with jeans, but I hesitate to pair them with a true black anything (shirt, skirt, pants, shorts, etc.).FITYeah…NOT a true 10. I recently had my left hip replaced so I have a long shoe horn to help me get sneakers on (except my beloved Kiziks which I now wear almost exclusively). If I didn’t have the shoe horn and the benefit of some flexibility regained over 2 months of physical therapy, these wouldn’t go on. Period. They are SUPER snug. I’m hoping they’ll stretch with frequent wearing. If they don’t? I’ll be putting them up for sale with full disclosure on the fit. The heel is snug, and I like that they don’t slip. But the toe box isn’t truly rounded so my toes are squished together like little polished sardines! LOL Despite the more pointed toe, they don’t really make my foot look long. That’s a plus but one that won’t qualify if it turns out I can’t wear them.QUALITYThey seem well made overall. The fraying fabric gives them a worn look as noted above. The one thing that surprised me was the tread. The bottoms are seriously slick on hardwood floors and tile right out of the box. I went out and scuffed them up some on the driveway, but I think it’s going to take a few seatings before they aren’t so slick.OVERALLI’m not thrilled with them. I ordered a white pair before these arrived, and I’m 95% sure I’ll be returning them without opening the box. I’m just not sure they’re the right canvas sneaker for me given that I’m not positive I’ll be able to comfortably wear them.Hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023

reviews.reviewText: They are comfortable and cute! I get complements everywhere I go!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these shoes.
reviews.reviewText: This is about my 10th pair of these shoes. I always get size 10 because they don't have half sizes. This 10 was much closer to a 9.5 than the others were.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have several pairs of Blowfish sneakers. These are my Favorite :) Cute & comfy too.
Los tenis llegaron en tiempo y son muy bonitos, pero no tan cómodos. Sobre todo en las costuras cerca de la puntera, ufff. Igual úsalos para lucirlos, no para caminar.
